name: Stunt Byke Water Racing 2018
description:
Stunt Bike Water Racing introduces a brand new riding expertise of water surfboarding with crazy bikes. Drive your favourite bike on beach like professional with tough tracks. This bike racing water game gives you a chance to play something else than the other boring type water floating games. With daredevil bike stunts and smooth controls, get pleasure from high-speed surfboarding on the water. You will ride your bike on a beach to check your driving skills. Stunt Master Water Racing is outstanding Stunts racing game. Show your motocross riding skills and become the professional driver by playing Stunt Master Water Racing 2018.

In Stunt Master Water Racing game Control your bike and drive with high speed while not following any driving rule. Press the acceleration tab to hurry up your bike whereas performing stunts action and click on brake button to prevent the bike. This water bike race floating game is require floating, racing and driving skills. Along with your super floating bikes, you will simply ride on floating water and find thrilling bike stunts journey.

Features:
• Enhance physics based engine
• Smooth and flexible controlling system
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Original sound impacts
• Modern fastest sports bikes in the aqua racing adventure game
• Multi-level gameplay
• Off-road riding game
• Realistic experience of bikes racing and driving adventure


Stunt Bike Water Racing game is bike stunts game with outstanding features and gameplay with tricky tracks with many levels. Play this game to enjoy. Have Fun!
